import { PackageCmd } from '@theguild/components'

# Redis Cache

This caching strategy will use your Redis instance as the storage.

To get started with this caching strategy, install it:

<PackageCmd packages={['@graphql-mesh/cache-redis']} />

## How to use?

```yaml
cache:
  redis:
    host: localhost
    port: 9876
    password: MY_SECRET_PASSWORD
```

## Config API Reference

{'@import ../generated-markdown/RedisConfig.generated.md'}
